title: Regions R and S part - b

content.description: Let R be the region bounded by the graph of  y=e2x−x2 and the horizontal line y=2, and let S be the region bounded by the graph of  y=e2x−x2 and the horizontal lines y=1 and y=2, as shown above.
content.question: (b) Find the area of S.

topic.text: 8.6: Finding the Area Between Curves That Intersect at More Than Two Points

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
